<div class="header">
<div class="subTitle">nl.weeaboo.vn.scene</div>
<h2 title="Interface IButtonModel" class="title">Interface IButtonModel</h2>
</div>
<div class="contentContainer">
<div class="description">
<ul class="blockList">
<li class="blockList">
<dl>
<dt>All Superinterfaces:</dt>
<dd>java.io.Serializable</dd>
</dl>
<hr>
<br>
<pre>public interface <span class="typeNameLabel">IButtonModel</span>
extends java.io.Serializable</pre>
<div class="block">State for button-like objects.</div>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="summary">
<ul class="blockList">
<li class="blockList">

<td class="colLast"><code><span class="memberNameLink"><a href="../../../../nl/weeaboo/vn/scene/IButtonModel.html#isToggle--">isToggle</a></span>()</code>&nbsp;</td>

</tr>
<tr id="i7" class="rowColor">

</td>
</tr>
<tr id="i8" class="altColor">
<td class="colFirst"><code>void</code></td>
<td class="colLast"><code><span class="memberNameLink"><a href="../../../../nl/weeaboo/vn/scene/IButtonModel.html#setRollover-boolean-">setRollover</a></span>(boolean&nbsp;rollover)</code>
<div class="block">Sets the 'rollover' flag.</div>
</td>
</tr>
<tr id="i9" class="rowColor">
<td class="colFirst"><code>void</code></td>
<td class="colLast"><code><span class="memberNameLink"><a href="../../../../nl/weeaboo/vn/scene/IButtonModel.html#setSelected-boolean-">setSelected</a></span>(boolean&nbsp;s)</code>
<div class="block">Changes the selected state for this button.</div>
</td>
</tr>
<tr id="i10" class="altColor">
<td class="colFirst"><code>void</code></td>
<td class="colLast"><code><span class="memberNameLink"><a href="../../../../nl/weeaboo/vn/scene/IButtonModel.html#setToggle-boolean-">setToggle</a></span>(boolean&nbsp;t)</code>
<div class="block">Changes if this button functions as a regular button or a toggle button (stays selected when pressed).</div>
</td>
</tr>

</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="details">
<ul class="blockList">
<li class="blockList">
<!-- ============ METHOD DETAIL ========== -->
<ul class="blockList">
<li class="blockList"><a name="method.detail">
<!--   -->
</a>
<h3>Method Detail</h3>
<a name="consumePress--">
<!--   -->
</a>
<ul class="blockList">
<li class="blockList">
<h4>consumePress</h4>
<pre>boolean&nbsp;consumePress()</pre>
<div class="block">Buttons store internally if they've been pressed. This method returns if that has been the case and
 clears the internal pressed flag.</div>
</li>
</ul>
<a name="isRollover--">
<!--   -->
</a>
<ul class="blockList">
<li class="blockList">
<h4>isRollover</h4>
<pre>boolean&nbsp;isRollover()</pre>
<dl>
<dt><span class="returnLabel">Returns:</span></dt>
<dd><code>true</code> if the mouse is hovering over this button.</dd>
</dl>
</li>
</ul>
<a name="setRollover-boolean-">
<!--   -->
</a>
<ul class="blockList">
<li class="blockList">
<h4>setRollover</h4>
<pre>void&nbsp;setRollover(boolean&nbsp;rollover)</pre>
<div class="block">Sets the 'rollover' flag.</div>
<dl>
<dt><span class="seeLabel">See Also:</span></dt>
<dd><a href="../../../../nl/weeaboo/vn/scene/IButtonModel.html#isRollover--"><code>isRollover()</code></a></dd>
</dl>
</li>
</ul>
<a name="isPressed--">
<!--   -->
</a>
<ul class="blockList">
<li class="blockList">
<h4>isPressed</h4>
<pre>boolean&nbsp;isPressed()</pre>
<dl>
<dt><span class="returnLabel">Returns:</span></dt>
<dd><code>true</code> if this button is currently being pressed.</dd>
</dl>
</li>
</ul>
<a name="setPressed-boolean-">
<!--   -->
</a>
<ul class="blockList">
<li class="blockList">
<h4>setPressed</h4>
<pre>void&nbsp;setPressed(boolean&nbsp;pressed)</pre>
<div class="block">Sets the 'pressed' flag.</div>
<dl>
<dt><span class="seeLabel">See Also:</span></dt>
<dd><a href="../../../../nl/weeaboo/vn/scene/IButtonModel.html#isPressed--"><code>isPressed()</code></a></dd>
</dl>
</li>
</ul>
<a name="isEnabled--">
<!--   -->
</a>
<ul class="blockList">
<li class="blockList">
<h4>isEnabled</h4>
<pre>boolean&nbsp;isEnabled()</pre>
<dl>
<dt><span class="returnLabel">Returns:</span></dt>
<dd><code>true</code> if this button is enabled.</dd>
</dl>
</li>
</ul>
<a name="setEnabled-boolean-">
<!--   -->
</a>
<ul class="blockList">
<li class="blockList">
<h4>setEnabled</h4>
<pre>void&nbsp;setEnabled(boolean&nbsp;e)</pre>
<div class="block">Enables or disables the button. A disabled button can't be pressed.</div>
</li>
</ul>
<a name="isSelected--">
<!--   -->
</a>
<ul class="blockList">
<li class="blockList">
<h4>isSelected</h4>
<pre>boolean&nbsp;isSelected()</pre>
<dl>
<dt><span class="returnLabel">Returns:</span></dt>
<dd><code>true</code> if <a href="../../../../nl/weeaboo/vn/scene/IButtonModel.html#setSelected-boolean-"><code>setSelected(boolean)</code></a> has been used to manually set the selected state,
         or if this button is a toggle button and is currently toggled (pressed).</dd>
</dl>
</li>
</ul>
<a name="setSelected-boolean-">
<!--   -->
</a>
<ul class="blockList">
<li class="blockList">
<h4>setSelected</h4>
<pre>void&nbsp;setSelected(boolean&nbsp;s)</pre>
<div class="block">Changes the selected state for this button. For toggle buttons, the selected state determines whether
 the buttons stays pressed or not.</div>
</li>
</ul>
<a name="isToggle--">
<!--   -->
</a>
<ul class="blockList">
<li class="blockList">
<h4>isToggle</h4>
<pre>boolean&nbsp;isToggle()</pre>
<dl>
<dt><span class="returnLabel">Returns:</span></dt>
<dd><code>true</code> if this button is a toggle button.</dd>
</dl>
</li>
</ul>
<a name="setToggle-boolean-">
<!--   -->
</a>
<ul class="blockListLast">
<li class="blockList">
<h4>setToggle</h4>
<pre>void&nbsp;setToggle(boolean&nbsp;t)</pre>
<div class="block">Changes if this button functions as a regular button or a toggle button (stays selected when pressed).</div>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
